https://tmrev.io/movie/269980-Agostinho da Silva - A Living Thought 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3jGG5EJJxZaSAmc6TQXgX5FDq4n.jpg Life and legacy of Agostinho da Silva. Traversing the biographical journey, the life and work of the Luso-Brazilian philosopher, this work has testimonies from himself and various personalities of Portugal and Brazil that allow us to unravel his personality and multifaceted thought. Agostinho da Silva - A Living Thought
